hwtacacs_schema.description: Huawei Terminal Access Controller Access-Control System.

default-remote-address.description: Default remote address of HWTACACS server.

name.description: Name of a HWTACACS template. The template name can have alphabets a to z and numbers from 0 to 9 or symbols ('.', '-' and '_').

quiet-time.description: Time period after which the primary server restores to active. The time period can be modified no matter whether users are using the HWTACACS template.

shared-key.description: Shared key for a HWTACACS server, which is a string ranging from 1 to 255 characters for a unencrypted key and 20 to 432 characters for a encrypted key. Configuring a shared key improves the communication security between a router and HWTACACS server. By default, no shared key is configured.

source-address.description: Source IP address of the packets sent to the server.

server-ip-address.description: Server IPv4 address. Must be a valid unicast IP address.

is-secondary-server.description: Enable/disable the secondary server. By default, a server is a secondary server. A template does not support multiple primary servers of the same type.

vpn-name.description: VPN instance name. It must be an existing VPN instance.

is-mux-mode-enable.description: Enable/disable the MUX mode for the server.

shared-key.description: Shared key for a HWTACACS server, which is a string ranging from 1 to 255 characters for a unencrypted key and 20 to 432 characters for a encrypted key. Configuring a shared key improves the communication security between a router and HWTACACS server. By default, no shared key is configured.

authen-server-open-num.description: Number of times that the HWTACACS client connected to the authentication server.

authen-server-close-num.description: Number of times that the HWTACACS client disconnected from the authentication server.

author-server-open-num.description: Number of times that the HWTACACS client connected to the authorization server.

author-server-close-num.description: Number of times that the HWTACACS client disconnected from the authorization server.

acct-server-open-num.description: Number of times that the HWTACACS client connected to the accounting server.

acct-server-close-num.description: Number of times that the HWTACACS client disconnected from the accounting server.

is-current-server.description: Whether the server is being used.

server-ip-address.description: Server IPv6 address. Must be a valid unicast IP address.

is-secondary-server.description: Enable/disable whether the server is secondary. By default, a server is a secondary server. A template does not support multiple primary servers of the same type.

vpn-name.description: Configure the vpn-instance name. It must be an existing VPN instance.

is-mux-mode-enable.description: Enable/disable the MUX mode for the server. By default, the MUX mode is disabled.

shared-key.description: Shared key for a HWTACACS server, which is a string ranging from 1 to 255 characters for a unencrypted key and 20 to 432 characters for a encrypted key. Configuring a shared key improves the communication security between a router and HWTACACS server. By default, no shared key is configured.

pri-authen-server.description: IP address of the primary authentication server.

pri-author-server.description: IP address of the primary authorization server.

pri-common-server.description: IP address of the primary common server.

cur-authen-server.description: IP address of the authentication server being used.

cur-author-server.description: IP address of authorization server being used.

sec-authen-server-num.description: Total number of configured secondary authentication servers in the template.

sec-common-server-num.description: Total number of configured secondary common servers in the template.

sec-author-server-num.description: Total number of configured secondary authorization servers in the template.

pri-authen-port.description: Port of the primary authentication server.

pri-common-port.description: Port of the primary common server.

pri-author-port.description: Port of the primary authorization server.

authen-server-open-num.description: Number of times that the HWTACACS client connected to the authentication server.

authen-server-close-num.description: Number of times that the HWTACACS client disconnected from the authentication server.

authen-unknown-num.description: Number of unknown authentication packets received by the HWTACACS client.

authen-timeout-num.description: Number of times that authentication times out.

authen-pkt-drop-num.description: Number of times that authentication packets are dropped.

authen-change-password-num.description: Number of times that the password is changed for authentication.

authen-send-num.description: Number of authentication requests sent to server.

authen-send-password-num.description: Number of authentication password requests sent to the server.

authen-abort-num.description: Number of authentication abort requests sent to server.

authen-connect-num.description: Number of authentication connection requests sent to server.

authen-rsp-err-num.description: Number of authentication error responses received from server.

authen-rsp-fail-num.description: Number of authentication response failures received from server.

authen-follow-num.description: Number of authentication Follow responses received from server.

authen-get-data-num.description: Number of authentication date responses received from server.

authen-get-password-num.description: Number of authentication password responses received from server.

authen-get-user-num.description: Number of authentication user responses received from server.

authen-rsp-pass-num.description: Number of authentication-pass responses received from server.

authen-restart-num.description: Number of authentication-restart responses received from server.

authen-not-proc-req-num.description: Number of authentication requests that are not processed.

authen-round-trip-time.description: Time (in tick) taken to complete the authentication.

author-server-open-num.description: Number of times that the HWTACACS client connected to the authorization server.

author-server-close-num.description: Number of times that the HWTACACS client disconnected from the authorization server.

author-unknown-num.description: Number of unknown authorization packets received by HWTACACS client.

author-timeout-num.description: Number of times that authorization times out.

author-pkt-drop-num.description: Number of times that authorization packets are dropped.

author-exec-num.description: Number of authorization requests for EXEC.

author-ppp-num.description: Number of authorization requests for PPP.

author-vpdn-num.description: Number of authorization requests for VPDN.

author-round-trip-time.description: Time (in tick) taken to complete authorization.

author-not-proc-req-num.description: Number of authorization requests that are not processed.

sec-account-server-num.description: Number of secondary accounting servers in the template.

pri-account-port.description: Port of the primary accounting server.

acct-stop-pkt-num.description: Number of responses to accounting-stop packets.

acct-rsp-pass-num.description: Number of responses to accounting-pass packets.

acct-rsp-num.description: Number of responses to accounting requests.

acct-server-open-num.description: Number of times that the HWTACACS client connected to the accounting server.

acct-start-pkt-num.description: Number of responses to accounting-start packets.

acct-req-num.description: Number of accounting requests sent to the server.

acct-server-close-num.description: Number of times that the HWTACACS client disconnected from the accounting server.

acct-rsp-err-num.description: Number of abnormal accounting responses received from the server.

acct-follow-num.description: Number of accounting Follow responses received from server.

acct-not-proc-req-num.description: Number of accounting requests that are not processed.
